game.name: DCS: F/A-18C Rise of the Persian Lion II Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: This campaign follows on from Ford and Matrix’s exploits in the Straits of Hormuz on board the USS Abraham Lincoln in the “Rise of the Persian Lion Campaign.” The campaign creates an imaginative, immersive, and engaging set of missions linked together with a developing narrative.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This campaign follows on from Ford and Matrix’s exploits in the Straits of Hormuz on board the USS Abraham Lincoln in the “Rise of the Persian Lion Campaign.” The campaign creates an imaginative, immersive, and engaging set of missions linked together with a developing narrative.
